sourcesContent:
import React from 'react'; import { Calendar, MapPin, GraduationCap, Code, Award, Users } from 'lucide-react'; const Experience: React.FC = () => { const experiences = [ { type: "Education", title: "Bachelor's Degree in Computer Science", institution: "University Name", location: "City, State", duration: "2020 - 2024", description: "Pursuing my final year with focus on software engineering, algorithms, and web development. Maintaining strong academic performance while building practical projects.", achievements: [ "Final Year Student with strong academic record", "Completed core courses in Data Structures, Algorithms, Database Systems", "Active participation in coding competitions and hackathons", "Member of Computer Science Club and Technical Societies" ], icon: , color: "from-blue-500 to-blue-600" }, { type: "Development Experience", title: "Backend Developer", institution: "Personal Projects & Freelance", location: "Remote", duration: "2021 - Present", description: "Building robust backend applications using Java and Spring Framework. Specializing in server-side development with REST APIs and database design.", achievements: [ "Developed 10+ backend applications using Java, Spring Framework, and Spring Boot", "Built RetroArcade.in - a complete gaming platform with real-time features", "Experience with multiple databases: MongoDB, PostgreSQL, MySQL", "Implemented authentication, REST APIs, and microservices architecture" ], icon: , color: "from-green-500 to-green-600" }, { type: "Technical Skills", title: "Technology Stack Development", institution: "Self-Learning & Practice", location: "Online", duration: "2020 - Present", description: "Continuously expanding my technical skillset through hands-on projects, online courses, and real-world application development.", achievements: [ "Strong foundation in Java programming and Spring Boot framework", "Proficient in modern frontend technologies: React, TypeScript, Tailwind CSS", "Experience with cloud services: Supabase, Firebase, AWS basics", "Database expertise: MongoDB, PostgreSQL, MySQL with JDBC" ], icon: , color: "from-purple-500 to-purple-600" } ]; const certifications = [ { name: "Java Programming", issuer: "Oracle", year: "2023", description: "Core Java concepts and advanced programming techniques" }, { name: "Spring Boot Development", issuer: "Spring Framework", year: "2023", description: "Building RESTful APIs and microservices with Spring Boot" }, { name: "React Development", issuer: "Meta", year: "2022", description: "Modern React development with hooks and functional components" }, { name: "MongoDB Database", issuer: "MongoDB University", year: "2022", description: "NoSQL database design and development" } ]; return (

Experience & Education

My journey in software development and academic achievements

{/* Main Experience Timeline */}
{experiences.map((experience, index) => (
{/* Timeline Line */} {index < experiences.length - 1 && (
)}
{/* Icon */}
{experience.icon}
{/* Content */}
{experience.type}

{experience.title}

{experience.institution}

{experience.duration}
{experience.location}

{experience.description}

Key Achievements:
    {experience.achievements.map((achievement, achievementIndex) => (
  • {achievement}
    • ))}
))}
{/* Certifications */}

Certifications & Achievements

Professional certifications and recognition for my technical skills

{certifications.map((cert, index) => (

{cert.name}

{cert.year}

{cert.issuer}

{cert.description}

))}
{/* Future Goals */}

What's Next?

As I approach graduation, I'm excited to take on new challenges in software development. I'm looking for opportunities to work with innovative teams, contribute to meaningful projects, and continue growing as a developer.

Open to new opportunities and collaborations
); }; export default Experience;
